short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement

## Department of National Defence

### Solicitation Number
W8482-230328/A

### Title
CYLINDER ASSEMBLY, ACTUATING LINEAR

### Contracting Entity Information
* Contractor Name: Department of National Defence
* Contact Person: Ashley Nadeau-Weeks, 
* Contact Info: tel: , email: <ASHLEY.NADEAU-WEEKS@forces.gc.ca>
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of CYLINDER ASSEMBLY, ACTUATING LINEAR. The required items are detailed below.

* Item 1: NSN: 21-9076243, Part No.: 600845, ADMIRAL FILTER COMPANY, 15 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: NSN: 21-9076243, Part No.: 600845, ADMIRAL FILTER COMPANY, 15 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

Bidders are requested to propose an equivalent or substitute product, including the brand name and model, or Part Number and NCAGE.

### Tender Requirements
* Tender must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.
* Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity
Canada

### Regions of Delivery
* Nova Scotia
* British Columbia

### Evaluation Criteria
Selection criteria are available in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documentation.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/90e1b009163f9dee846fc0f76ece2142/w8482-230328_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/961732afa5752c07233751c80a73278b/w8482-230328_-_french_rfp_clauses.pdf (French)

### Closing Date
October 4, 2022, 14:00:00 (local time)
